enchantment.extra_enchants.ace.desc: While flying: Damage reduction, melee and arrow damage are increased.
enchantment.extra_enchants.arrow_speed.d: Increases the velocity and damage of fired arrows.
enchantment.extra_enchants.barbaric.desc: Increases damage by an amount inversely proportional to the user's armor.
enchantment.extra_enchants.berserk.desc: Increases damage by an amount proportional to the amount of health lost.
enchantment.extra_enchants.blaze_affinit: Increases damage and damage reduction while on fire.
enchantment.extra_enchants.bounding.desc: When initiating a sprint, gain a massive burst of speed. 3 second cooldown.
enchantment.extra_enchants.cleaving.desc: Ignores a portion of enemy armor.
enchantment.extra_enchants.core_of_purit: Health is doubled, damage taken is reduced when healthy, speed is slightly reduced. Damage dealt is set to 1.
enchantment.extra_enchants.core_of_neptu: The less air you have, the stronger you are. Conversely, the more air you have, the weaker you become.
enchantment.extra_enchants.core_of_the_b: Doubles health and increases attack damage. Armor is decreased and enemies may deal critical hits.
enchantment.extra_enchants.core_of_the_w: Health is halved, damage reduction, move speed is increased, and chance to randomly teleport.
enchantment.extra_enchants.ender.desc: On full draw: Teleport to arrow hit location.
enchantment.extra_enchants.explosive.des: On full draw: Arrows are non-retrievable, explode on impact instead of dealing damage normally.
enchantment.extra_enchants.lifesteal.des: Drains a small amount of health upon dealing damage.
enchantment.extra_enchants.magic_guard.d: The user can only be damaged directly.
enchantment.extra_enchants.magnetic.desc: While held: items will move towards the holder.
While sneaking: the user will gain Night Vision.
enchantment.extra_enchants.nimble.desc: Increased bow draw speed but decreased damage.
enchantment.extra_enchants.propelling.de: While flying: the user's speed will be maintained at a minimum, which decreases with height gain. Firework use is disabled.
enchantment.extra_enchants.psychic.desc: While sneaking: the nearest mob within 7 blocks the user is facing will be exposed. Ignores blocks.
enchantment.extra_enchants.reflecting.de: While blocking: projectiles will be reflecting in the direction the user is facing. Reflected velocity scales with level.
While sneaking, the camera will zoom in 3x. Arrow damage is increased.
enchantment.extra_enchants.shock_resista: Damage taken when ramming into things with an elytra is reduced.
enchantment.extra_enchants.slimey.desc: Slipperiness of blocks is massively increased.
enchantment.extra_enchants.sniper.desc: Bows take more time to draw, but deal more damage and fly faster.
enchantment.extra_enchants.soulbound.des: Item stays in inventory after death.
enchantment.extra_enchants.stalwart.desc: Shield cooldown after axe hits is lowered.
enchantment.extra_enchants.steadfast.des: Decreases the weapon drawing movement penalty.
Greatly increases mining speed. Broken blocks drop nothing.
enchantment.extra_enchants.thunderbolt.d: If arrow has sky access on hit, summons lightning instead of dealing damage.
enchantment.extra_enchants.turbo.desc: Decreases elytra firework boost lifetime, but increases the speed boost
enchantment.extra_enchants.weighted.desc: Decreases attack speed, increases attack damage.
enchantment.extra_enchants.windstep.desc: Increases step height, allowing the user to instantly walk up 1 block tall inclines.
